column1: [142]  In  addition  to  the  general  deductions  (outgoings  and  expenses)
specified in Section 23 (1)/25 (1), it has several other sub-sections, referring
to several outgoings or expenses that are permitted to be deducted, which
the Appellant has described them as “special items of deductions”. Those
paragraphs, i.e. (a) to (w) of S. 23 (1) of the IRA 2000 or S. 25 (1) of the IRA
